techmeme.title: Trump issues an EO pausing the removal of the de minimis exemption on goods from China until systems are in place to "process and collect tariff revenue" (Jay Peters/The Verge)
A German court rules that X must provide researchers access to data for tracking misinformation and disinformation ahead of Germany's national election (Thomas Escritt/Reuters)
Uber's stock jumps 7%+ after Bill Ackman disclosed that his hedge fund Pershing Square Capital Management owns 30.3M shares; Pershing started buying in January (Bloomberg)
Apple settles a lawsuit against a former iOS Software Engineer who leaked Journal app details and more to journalists; the employee issues an apology on X (Ryan Christoffel/9to5Mac)
Sources: the UK used Snoopers' Charter to send a "technical capability notice" to Apple; notice recipients aren't allowed to warn users of weakened security (Financial Times)
